history.proof: pose proof (msum_0 (fun _ : nat => u)) as H0. unfold msum in H0. shelve.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
X: Type
m: X -> X -> X
u: X
Hmonoid: monoid_theory m u
n: nat

Goal:
∑ n (fun _ : nat => u) = u

Premises:
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
monoid_theory : forall X : Type, (X -> X -> X) -> X -> Prop
Fin.of_nat_ext : forall h h' : ?p < ?n, Fin.of_nat_lt h = Fin.of_nat_lt h' where ?p : [X : Type m : X -> X -> X u : X Hmonoid : monoid_theory m u n : nat |- nat] ?n : [X : Type m : X -> X -> X u : X Hmonoid : monoid_theory m u n : nat |- nat]
Fin.of_nat_to_nat_inv : forall p : Fin.t ?m, Fin.of_nat_lt (proj2_sig (Fin.to_nat p)) = p where ?m : [X : Type m : X -> X -> X u : X Hmonoid : monoid_theory m u n : nat |- nat]
monoid_unit_l : forall (X : Type) (m : X -> X -> X) (u : X), monoid_theory m u -> forall x : X, m u x = x
monoid_unit_r : forall (X : Type) (m : X -> X -> X) (u : X), monoid_theory m u -> forall x : X, m x u = x
monoid_assoc : forall (X : Type) (m : X -> X -> X) (u : X), monoid_theory m u -> forall x y z : X, m x (m y z) = m (m x y) z
msum = fix msum (n : nat) (f : nat -> X) {struct n} : X := match n with | 0 => u | S n0 => f 0 ⊕ msum n0 (fun n1 : nat => f (S n1)) end : nat -> (nat -> X) -> X Arguments msum _%nat_scope _%function_scope
mk_monoid : forall (X : Type) (m : X -> X -> X) (u : X), (forall x : X, m u x = x) -> (forall x : X, m x u = x) -> (forall x y z : X, m x (m y z) = m (m x y) z) -> monoid_theory m u
list_split_length : forall (X : Type) (ll : list X) (k : nat), k <= length ll -> {l : list X & {r : list X | ll = l ++ r /\ length l = k}}
msum_plus : forall (a b : nat) (f : nat -> X), ∑ (a + b) f = ∑ a f ⊕ ∑ b (fun i : nat => f (a + i))
msum_S : forall (n : nat) (f : nat -> X), ∑ (S n) f = f 0 ⊕ ∑ n (fun n0 : nat => f (S n0))
msum_ext : forall (n : nat) (f g : nat -> X), (forall i : nat, i < n -> f i = g i) -> ∑ n f = ∑ n g
msum_plus1 : forall (n : nat) (f : nat -> X), ∑ (S n) f = ∑ n f ⊕ f n
msum_0 : forall f : nat -> X, ∑ 0 f = u
msum_1 : forall f : nat -> X, ∑ 1 f = f 0
msum_fold_map : forall (n : nat) (f : nat -> X), ∑ n f = fold_right m u (map f (list_an 0 n))
Nat.sqrt_up_wd = let H : Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eq (Morphisms.respectful eq eq)) Nat.compare := fun (x x' : nat) (Hx : x = x') (y y' : nat) (Hy : y = y') => match Nat.compare_spec x y in (CompareSpec _ _ _ c) return (c = (x' ?= y')) with | CompEq _ _ x0 => match Nat.compare_spec x' y' in (CompareSpec _ _ _ c) return (x = y -> Eq = c) with | CompEq _ _ _ => fun _ : x = y => eq_refl | CompLt _ _ H => fun H0 : x = y => False_ind (Eq = Lt) ((fun Hx0 : y = x' => (fun Hy0 : x' = y' => (fun H1 : y' < y' => Nat.Private_OrderTac.Tac.lt_irrefl H1) (Nat.Private_OrderTac.Tac.eq_lt (Nat.Private_OrderTac.Tac.eq_sym Hy0) H)) (Nat.Private_OrderTac.Tac.eq_trans (Nat...
Nat.le_alt = fun n m : nat => exists p : nat, p + n = m : nat -> nat -> Prop Arguments Nat.le_alt (_ _)%nat_scope
Nat.sqrt_up = fun a : nat => match 0 ?= a with | Lt => S (Nat.sqrt (Nat.pred a)) | _ => 0 end : nat -> nat Arguments Nat.sqrt_up _%nat_scope
ZMicromega.ZTautoChecker = fun (f : Tauto.BFormula (RingMicromega.Formula Z)) (w : list ZMicromega.ZArithProof) => Tauto.tauto_checker ZMicromega.Zunsat ZMicromega.Zdeduce ZMicromega.normalise ZMicromega.negate (fun cl : list (RingMicromega.NFormula Z * unit) => ZMicromega.ZChecker (map fst cl)) f w : Tauto.BFormula (RingMicromega.Formula Z) -> list ZMicromega.ZArithProof -> bool Arguments ZMicromega.ZTautoChecker _ _%list_scope
BinIntDef.Z.to_nat = fun z : Z => match z with | Z.pos p => Pos.to_nat p | _ => 0 end : Z -> nat Arguments BinIntDef.Z.to_nat _%Z_scope
Inductive GFormula (TA TX AA AF : Type) : Type := TT : Tauto.GFormula | FF : Tauto.GFormula | X : TX -> Tauto.GFormula | A : TA -> AA -> Tauto.GFormula | Cj : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | D : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | N : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | I : Tauto.GFormula -> option AF -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula Arguments Tauto.GFormula {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.TT {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.FF {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.X {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.A {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.Cj {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.D {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.N {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.I {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope
gcd.divides = fun n k : nat => exists p : nat, k = p * n : nat -> nat -> Prop Arguments gcd.divides (_ _)%nat_scope
Nat.divide = fun x y : nat => exists z : nat, y = z * x : nat -> nat -> Prop Arguments Nat.divide (_ _)%nat_scope
Fin.to_nat = fix to_nat (m : nat) (n : Fin.t m) {struct n} : {i : nat | i < m} := match n in (Fin.t n0) return {i : nat | i < n0} with | @Fin.F1 j => exist (fun i : nat => i < S j) 0 (Nat.lt_0_succ j) | @Fin.FS n0 p => let (i, P) := to_nat n0 p in exist (fun i0 : nat => i0 < S n0) (S i) (lt_n_S i n0 P) end : forall m : nat, Fin.t m -> {i : nat | i < m} Arguments Fin.to_nat {m}%nat_scope
gcd.div = fun q p : nat => projT1 (gcd.div_full q p) : nat -> nat -> nat Arguments gcd.div (_ _)%nat_scope
gcd.rem = fun q p : nat => proj1_sig (projT2 (gcd.div_full q p)) : nat -> nat -> nat Arguments gcd.rem (_ _)%nat_scope
Zeq_bool = fun x y : Z => match (x ?= y)%Z with | Eq => true | _ => false end : Z -> Z -> bool Arguments Zeq_bool (_ _)%Z_scope
BinNatDef.N.eqb = fun n m : N => match n with | 0%N => match m with | 0%N => true | N.pos _ => false end | N.pos p => match m with | 0%N => false | N.pos q => (p =? q)%positive end end : N -> N -> bool Arguments BinNatDef.N.eqb (_ _)%N_scope
BinNatDef.N.compare = fun n m : N => match n with | 0%N => match m with | 0%N => Eq | N.pos _ => Lt end | N.pos n' => match m with | 0%N => Gt | N.pos m' => (n' ?= m')%positive end end : N -> N -> comparison Arguments BinNatDef.N.compare (_ _)%N_scope
Nat.eqf = fun f g : nat -> bool => forall n : nat, f n = g n : (nat -> bool) -> (nat -> bool) -> Prop Arguments Nat.eqf (_ _)%function_scope
Nat.lcm = fun a b : nat => a * (b / Nat.gcd a b) : nat -> nat -> nat Arguments Nat.lcm (_ _)%nat_scope
PeanoNat.Nat.mod_wd_obligation_1 = fun (x y : nat) (H : x = y) (x0 y0 : nat) (H0 : x0 = y0) => eq_ind_r (fun x1 : nat => x mod x1 = y mod y0) (eq_ind_r (fun x1 : nat => x1 mod y0 = y mod y0) eq_refl H) H0 : Morphisms.respectful eq (Morphisms.respectful eq eq) Nat.modulo Nat.modulo
PeanoNat.Nat.sub_wd_obligation_1 = fun (x y : nat) (H : x = y) (x0 y0 : nat) (H0 : x0 = y0) => eq_ind_r (fun x1 : nat => x - x1 = y - y0) (eq_ind_r (fun x1 : nat => x1 - y0 = y - y0) eq_refl H) H0 : Morphisms.respectful eq (Morphisms.respectful eq eq) Init.Nat.sub Init.Nat.sub
map_map : forall (A B C : Type) (f : A -> B) (g : B -> C) (l : list A), map g (map f l) = map (fun x : A => g (f x)) l
BinIntDef.Z.to_N = fun z : Z => match z with | Z.pos p => N.pos p | _ => 0%N end : Z -> N Arguments BinIntDef.Z.to_N _%Z_scope
Ascii.ascii_of_nat = fun a : nat => Ascii.ascii_of_N (N.of_nat a) : nat -> Ascii.ascii Arguments Ascii.ascii_of_nat _%nat_scope
Inductive ZArithProof : Type := DoneProof : ZMicromega.ZArithProof | RatProof : ZMicromega.ZWitness -> ZMicromega.ZArithProof -> ZMicromega.ZArithProof | CutProof : ZMicromega.ZWitness -> ZMicromega.ZArithProof -> ZMicromega.ZArithProof | EnumProof : ZMicromega.ZWitness -> ZMicromega.ZWitness -> list ZMicromega.ZArithProof -> ZMicromega.ZArithProof | ExProof : positive -> ZMicromega.ZArithProof -> ZMicromega.ZArithProof Arguments ZMicromega.EnumProof _ _ _%list_scope Arguments ZMicromega.ExProof _%positive_scope
Nat.double_induction : forall R : nat -> nat -> Prop, Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eq (Morphisms.respectful eq iff)) R -> (forall m : nat, R 0 m) -> (forall n : nat, R (S n) 0) -> (forall n m : nat, R n m -> R (S n) (S m)) -> forall n m : nat, R n m
list_an = fix list_an (a n : nat) {struct n} : list nat := match n with | 0 => nil | S n0 => a :: list_an (S a) n0 end : nat -> nat -> list nat Arguments list_an (_ _)%nat_scope
Nat.divide_antisym_nonneg : forall n m : nat, 0 <= n -> 0 <= m -> Nat.divide n m -> Nat.divide m n -> n = m

``` 
pose proof (msum_0 (fun _ : nat => u)) as H0.
unfold msum in H0.
simpl in H0.
rewrite H0.
apply monoid_unit_r.
apply Hmonoid.
```

original: pose proof (msum_0 (fun _ : nat => u)) as H0. unfold msum in H0. simpl in H0. rewrite H0. apply monoid_unit_r. apply Hmonoid.
